meanings.definition: Say something again or a number of times, typically for emphasis or clarity.
meanings.sent1: She reiterates the instructions to make sure everyone understands.
meanings.sent2: The teacher reiterates the lesson for the students who missed it.
meanings.sent3: He reiterates the joke multiple times to make sure everyone gets it.
meanings.sent4: The echo in the canyon reiterates his voice, creating a haunting effect.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the waves reiterates the peacefulness of the beach.

meanings.sent1: The song reiterates the chorus to make it catchy.
meanings.sent2: I reiterate my request for you to pick up milk on your way home.
meanings.sent3: The parrot reiterates the words it hears, much to the amusement of the guests.
meanings.sent4: The ticking clock reiterates the passing of time with each second.
meanings.sent5: The drumbeat reiterates the rhythm of the music, keeping everyone in sync.
